price: আৰু নিশ্চয় সিহঁতৰ ওচৰলৈ আহি পাইছে সংবাদসমূহ, য’ত আছে সতৰ্কবাণী,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
